Post.title: AntDesign
Post._content:
## - - - antd ++ - - - ## ### UI `antd` Form `Form.create()` `getFieldDecorator` `Form.create()` ```jsx class Basic extends React.Component { render(){
{ getFieldDecorator('expiration', { initialValue: fields.expiration ? fields.expiration : undefined, validateFirst: true, rules: [ { required: true, message: '' } ] })() } } } Form.create()(Basic) ``` ### **** **** Form `getFieldDecorator` `validateFields` Props **** **** **** State Form Props `initialValue` Form **** **** `initialValue` ### Form AntDesign [](https://ant.design/components/form-cn/#components-form-demo-global-state) Re-Render - Form onFieldsChange `handleFormChange` State - State Props Form `mapPropsToFields` `Form.createFormField` ![real-time-synchronization](http://img.mrsingsing.com/ant-form-real-time-synchronization.png) - Form FieldsStore Child Re-Render - handleFormChange Re-Render ![verifying-synchronization](http://img.mrsingsing.com/ant-form-verifying-synchronization.png) ### Model DOM `initialValue` **** ```jsx static getDerviedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState){ if ( !isEmptyObject(dataDetail) && !isEmptyArray(dataList) && !prevState.isInitial ){ // ...Logic Disposal return { basic, receipt, usage, isInitial: true } } return null } ``` `getDerivedStateFromProps` Model Store `isInitial` Props `getDerivedStateFromProps` State ```jsx getCurrentStepComponent(current) { const canRendering = [basic, receipt, usage].every(item => !isEmptyObject(item)); if (!canRendering) { return (
); } // Return SubComponent to render } ``` ## ### - - - - - - AntDesign - ```jsx const data = { name: 'Foo', interval: { type: 'ALL', week: ['1', '2', '3'] interval: [ { startTime: '08:00', endTime: '10:00'}, { startTime: '12:00', endTime: '14: 00'} ] } } ``` - [](https://ant.design/components/form-cn/#components-form-demo-dynamic-form-item) Ant Design ![time-interval-exhibition](http://img.mrsingsing.com/ant-form-time-interval-exhibition.gif) ## Form - Radio / Checked feedback #issue - input Tab input tabindex -1 - input readonly - input `autoComplete=off` - getFieldDecorator `undefined` `null` `''` ```jsx getFieldDecorator('name', { initialValue: fields.name ? fields.name : undefined, rules: [], })(); ``` - `validateFirst: true` - `props` - `push` `concat` `filter` Immutable ## - - antd antd React - ## ### - [antd: ^3.12.0](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design) - [FormComponent](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/form/index.en-US.md) - [rc-form](https://github.com/react-component/form) - [async-validator](https://github.com/yiminghe/async-validator) - [moment: ^2.22.1](https://github.com/moment/moment) ### - [](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/blob/master/components/form/docs/tutorial.md) - [10 Ant Design Form ](https://juejin.im/post/5c47ffff51882533e05ef4f9) - [antd ](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/27740483?utm_medium=hao.caibaojian.com&utm_source=hao.caibaojian.com) - [Redux-sage API](https://redux-saga-in-chinese.js.org/docs/api/)

### koa-session

`koa-session2`  `koa-session2`  Redis  Session-Cookie 

```js
const Redis = require('ioredis');
const { Store } = require('koa-session2');

class RedisStore extends Store {
  constructor() {
    super();
    //  Redis
    this.redis = new Redis();
  }

  //  sid 
  async get(sid, ctx) {
    let data = await this.redis.get(`SESSION: ${sid}`);
    return JSON.parse(data);
  }

  //  sid 
  async set(session, { sid = this.getID(24), maxAge = 1000000 } = {}, ctx) {
    try {
      await this.redis.set(`SESSION: ${sid}`, JSON.stringfy(session));
    } catch (e) {}

    return sid;
  }

  // 
  async destroy(sid, ctx) {
    return await this.redis.del(`SESSION: ${sid}`);
  }
}

module.exports = RedisStore;
```

```js
// app.js
const Koa = require('koa');
const session = require('koa-session2');
const Store = require('./Store.js');

const app = new Koa();

app.use(
  session({
    //  Cookie 
    key: 'SESSIONID',
    //  JS  Cookie
    httpOnly: true,
    // Cookie 
    signed: true,
    store: new Store(),
  })
);

app.use(ctx => {
  // Ignore favicon.ico
  if (ctx.path === '/favicon.ico') return;

  let user = this.session.user;

  ctx.session.view = 'index';
});

app.use(ctx => {
  // 
  ctx.session.refresh();
});
```

`koa-session2`  `koa-session2`  Redis  Session-Cookie 

```js
const Redis = require('ioredis');
const { Store } = require('koa-session2');

class RedisStore extends Store {
  constructor() {
    super();
    //  Redis
    this.redis = new Redis();
  }

  //  sid 
  async get(sid, ctx) {
    let data = await this.redis.get(`SESSION: ${sid}`);
    return JSON.parse(data);
  }

  //  sid 
  async set(session, { sid = this.getID(24), maxAge = 1000000 } = {}, ctx) {
    try {
      await this.redis.set(`SESSION: ${sid}`, JSON.stringfy(session));
    } catch (e) {}

    return sid;
  }

  // 
  async destroy(sid, ctx) {
    return await this.redis.del(`SESSION: ${sid}`);
  }
}

module.exports = RedisStore;
```

```js
// app.js
const Koa = require('koa');
const session = require('koa-session2');
const Store = require('./Store.js');

const app = new Koa();

app.use(
  session({
    //  Cookie 
    key: 'SESSIONID',
    //  JS  Cookie
    httpOnly: true,
    // Cookie 
    signed: true,
    store: new Store(),
  })
);

app.use(ctx => {
  // Ignore favicon.ico
  if (ctx.path === '/favicon.ico') return;

  let user = this.session.user;

  ctx.session.view = 'index';
});

app.use(ctx => {
  // 
  ctx.session.refresh();
});
```
